item.title: Major ‘fake’ roadworks without permit, 20th January
item.description:
Skip and lots of fly tipping extending into the road inside fence blocking parking spaces without suitable permit or lighting. Signs regularly taken from nearby official roadworks creating a hazard
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Alabama Street, Plumstead

item.title: Used Fridge and Wardrobe Dumped Overnight on Wheathill Road, 20th January
item.description:
A used fridge and a large wardrobe have been dumped overnight on the pavement at Wheathill Road. This blocks the footway and creates a clear safety and hygiene risk. The repeated dumping of bulky items here shows that flytippers know there are no consequences.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wheathill Road, Anerley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Please plant a tree, 20th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ryecroft Road, Poverest, Greater London

item.title: Fly tipping caught in action Wallis Road, 20th January
item.description:
I have video evidence, clear imagery and the number plate of blatant fly tipping in Hackney Wick on Wallis Road. The fact that I cannot share this so the perpetrators can face the consequences is crazy! I want them fined up to £50000 or face jail time.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Palace Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog fouling from people in surrounding areas using private garden as dog poo area., 20th January
item.description:
We would like signage please for our garden fenced areas. We would like to discourage people from surrounding streets who are using this grass area as an area for their dogs to poo in and not picking up the waste. This is accessed by our children.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Horton Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree falling over onto road, 20th January
item.description:
